_header: Some time there was an heathen man
_description: Saints Savinian and Savina, in one MS of the South English Legendary

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
SVm tyme þer was an heþen manÞat men called Sauyn
                    þan…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Was I Martred and don to dedffor þei smiten of hire
                    hed
